intro: Schizoglossum debile, commonly known as the weak schizoglossum, is a small, herbaceous plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodland floors or along stream banks. Its leaves are lance-shaped and have a mild, aromatic scent. Schizoglossum debile is often found in temperate regions of North America and is relatively rare in the wild.
